snippet: In digital campaigns, conservative groups are sending a steady stream of posts attacking Hillary Rodham Clinton, some of them specifically designed to be spotted, and shared, by liberals.
abstract: Conservative group America Rising PAC has been focusing its attacks on Democratic presidential frontrunner Hillary Rodham Clinton with online media posts specifically designed to catch the notice of liberals; intention is to create anti-Clinton narrative by highlighting left's criticisms of her ties to Wall Street and Clinton Foundation; Karl Rove's conservative group American Crossroads is also compiling digital content denigrating Clinton.

byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and NICK CORASANITI

lead_paragraph: In digital campaigns, conservative groups are sending a steady stream of posts attacking Hillary Rodham Clinton, some of them specifically designed to be spotted, and shared, by liberals.

headline.main: The Right Baits the Left to Turn Against Hillary Clinton
headline.print_headline: The Right Baits the Left to Turn Against Clinton
